top3.descriptor: 3 disturbing enumerated facts (Number 1, Number 2, etc), very serious, dry, and realistic creepy pasta, enumerated list

naples.descriptor: A very weird and nonsensical story written in the style of a children's book mixed with modern day criminal napolitan, with a very serious and dry tone. Contains references to smoking cigarettes and riding mopeds without a helmet

youbait.descriptor: Very shocking, exxagerated urban legend story, with a very serious and dry tone. Very click bait and makes use of the word you a lot
